body:
Looks like @healther's  recent update to include v 3.5.9 broke the build:

```
curl: (37) Couldn't open file /home/hartzelg/tmp/spack-cime-sc1-working-dir/workspace/sc1-daily-build/spack-mirror/mirror/gnutls/gnutls-3.5.9.tar.xz
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
[...]
==> Fetching http://www.ring.gr.jp/pub/net/gnupg/gnutls/v3.3/gnutls-3.5.9.tar.xz
==> Fetching from http://www.ring.gr.jp/pub/net/gnupg/gnutls/v3.3/gnutls-3.5.9.tar.xz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for gnutls-3.5.9-wacj7mrkudwrxskrlqxe7wcxpzrrxhx2
Build step 'Execute shell' marked build as failure
Finished: FAILURE
```
title: GNUtls can't find  the tarball for 3.5.9
